Video evidence: The expert analyzed a 30-second video that showed a helicopter being shot down midair. This video was promoted on social media platforms.
Source analysis: The expert examined the original source of the claim, which was a Twitter user who posted about the incident. They investigated the credibility of the user and their previous posts.
Reverse image search: The expert conducted a reverse image search using InVid, a video verification platform, to determine the origin of the video. This search led them to a tweet by Hugo Kaaman, who had previously posted the same video with audio, stating that it was from Syria in 2012.
Cross: referencing with media reports: The expert found multiple media outlets that had reported on the incident in October 2012 in Syria. They referenced these reports to confirm that the video was not related to the claimed incident in Nepal.
